title: AIRi Invited Lecture: Benoit Challand - La Vorace: the convergence of photography, 3D printing, and artificial intelligence [In-person]
description:
[cid:85d89b03-3cc8-4df9-a132-7a4b3cff3ace]
ğŸ›ï¸ AIRi @ UTCN welcomes Benoit Challand (La Vorace), a French artist who explores the porous boundary between the digital and the physical.

His work has been featured in Wired, The Times, Le Monde, Elle, among others, and exhibited in Paris at: MusÃ©e des Archives Nationales and MusÃ©e des Arts DÃ©coratifs.

Working with 3D sculpture, 3D printing, and image-making, he builds worlds where form, texture, and technology meet. His practice transforms technical mastery into a poetic inquiry into what spaces â€œretainâ€ after we move through them: energy and emotion.

In this talk, he will share how photography, 3D, and AI converge in contemporary creation, revealing what happens when pixels decide to become matter.

Read more & follow the event: https://www.linkedin.com/events/airiinvitedlecture-benoitchalla7413939810547191809/
